original_text: Only make offerings to the Lord in the place that he chooses. That will be in the land that belongs to one of your tribes. It is the place where you must do all the things that I am commanding you to do.
korean_text: 오직 너희의 한 지파 중에 여호와께서 택하실 그 곳에서 번제를 드리고 또 내가 네게 명령하는 모든 것을 거기서 행할지니라

sentences.original_text: Only make offerings to the Lord
in the place that he chooses
That will be in the land
that belongs to one of your tribes
It is the place where you must do
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 너희가 반드시 행해야 할 곳이다

sentences.original_text: all the things that I am commanding you to do
